[Stride]-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[AUTO]:[Choose a face down card named "Aerial Divine Knight, Altmile" from your G zone, and turn it face up] When this unit is placed on (VC), you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this unit gets "[CONT](VC):All of the units in your front row get [Power] +3000.". Then, if the number of face up cards in your G zone is 2 or more, search your deck for up to one grade 2 card, call it to (RC), shuffle your deck, and that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Blue Sky Knight, Altmile
effect:
